entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #49: Save filter settings on Activity tab
entry.content:
• Target version set to Under consideration

Filing under "Unplanned" for now until we can do some research on what will be required to address this.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #49: Save filter settings on Activity tab
entry.content:
Comments
    • J - this sounds related to the desire to overhaul the activity (and really "My Page") pages, should be part of larger dashboard overhaul
    • Chris - agree with this looks like part of larger issue
